thread.section_title: PlantShed New York Flowers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PlantShed New York Flowers | plantshed.com
thread.title: Maria Hykin
thread.title_full: PlantShed New York Flowers reviewed by Maria Hykin

author: Maria Hykin
title: Maria Hykin
text: I didn't think it would be difficult to find a same-day flower delivery service in NYC, but it proved to be a challenge. Most of the shops that announce themselves as same-day delivery require you to place your order before 3pm. Thankfully, PlantShed didn't have that restriction and I was able to place my order around 4.30pm for a delivery between 5-9pm. And on such a short notice they even honored my request to deliver closer to 7.30pm! The bouquet was stunning and very reasonably priced compared to other shops in the area.
